TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit DesignerRegionCollection extends System.Object implements class System.Collections.ICollection, class System.Collections.IEnumerable, class System.Collections.IList

summary.span: 表示控件设计器中 对象的集合。

span.span: Represents a collection of objects within a control designer.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类，任何派生的类中，使用类来包含和如枚举在设计宿主中，控件的设计器区域[!INCLUDE[vsprvslong](~/includes/vsprvslong-md.md)]。The class, and any derived class, uses the class to contain and enumerate the designer regions for the control in a design host, such as [!INCLUDE[vsprvslong](~/includes/vsprvslong-md.md)]. 例如，方法可以用于定义和添加到集合的区域。For example, the method can be used to define and add regions to the collection. 使用属性来访问包含设计器区域集合的控件设计器对象。Use the property to access the control designer object that contains the designer region collection. 使用方法和属性可以检查和维护在集合中的对象。Use the methods and properties to examine and maintain the objects that are in the collection. 添加对象时，集合将动态增加。The collection dynamically increases as objects are added. 在此集合中的索引是从零开始。Indexes in this collection are zero-based. 使用属性以确定集合中有多少设计器区域。Use the property to determine how many designer regions are in the collection. 使用成员提供以下功能：Use the members to provide the following functionality: - 方法将一个设计器区域添加到集合。The method to add a single designer region to the collection. - 方法来在集合中的特定索引处添加设计器区域。The method to add a designer region at a particular index within the collection. - 方法来删除设计器区域。The method to remove a designer region. - 方法移除特定索引处的设计器区域。The method to remove the designer region at a particular index. - 方法来确定特定的设计器区域是否已在集合中。The method to determine whether a particular designer region is already in the collection. - 方法来检索集合中的设计器区域的索引。The method to retrieve the index of a designer region within the collection. - 索引器以获取或设置设计器区域中使用数组表示法的特定索引处。The indexer to get or set the designer region at a particular index, using array notation. - 方法从集合中移除所有设计器区域。The method to remove all designer regions from the collection.

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用构造函数来创建一个空集合。Use the constructor to create an empty collection. 你可以将元素添加到集合中使用或方法。You can add elements to the collection by using the or method.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(class System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner owner) cil managed

param.name: owner
param.span: 具有这一设计器区域集合的控件设计器。

span.span: The control designer that owns this collection of designer regions.

summary.span: 为指定的控件设计器初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class for the specified control designer.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 构造函数创建一个空集合，并将设置到指定的控件设计器对象的属性。The constructor creates an empty collection and sets the property to the specified control designer object. 可视设计器，如[!INCLUDE[vsprvslong](~/includes/vsprvslong-md.md)]，使用构造函数来初始化为特定的控件设计器的设计器区域集合。The visual designer, such as [!INCLUDE[vsprvslong](~/includes/vsprvslong-md.md)], uses the constructor to initialize a designer region collection for a specific control designer. 你可以将元素添加到集合中使用或方法。You can add elements to the collection by using the or method.

returns.span: 集合中添加了区域的位置的索引。

span.span: The index at which the region was added to the collection.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法将添加指定到集合末尾的对象。The method adds the specified object to the end of the collection. 若要添加对象添加到在特定索引位置，请使用收藏方法。To add a object to the collection at a specific index location, use the method.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用方法从集合中移除所有区域。Use the method to remove all regions from the collection. 若要从集合中移除特定区域，使用方法。To remove a specific region from the collection, use the method. 若要删除特定索引处的区域，使用方法。To remove a region at a particular index, use the method.

param.name: region

summary.span: 获取指示集合中是否包含指定区域的值。

span.span: Gets a value indicating whether the specified region is contained within the collection.

returns.span: 如果集合中存在该区域，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: , if the region is in the collection; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法通过使用来确定相等性方法对象。The method determines equality by using the method on the objects. 方法执行线性搜索; 因此，平均执行时间成比例属性。The method performs a linear search; therefore, the average execution time is proportional to the property. 因为模板区域集合通常很小，所以线性搜索操作的性能并不重要。Because template region collections are typically small, the performance of the linear search operation is not critical.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Count As Integer

summary.span: 获取集合中 对象的数量。

span.span: Gets the number of objects in the collection.

value.span: 集合中 对象的数目。

span.span: The number of objects in the collection.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性通常用于确定上限索引，当循环访问集合中的对象。The property is commonly used to determine the upper boundary index when iterating through objects in the collection. 集合索引是从零开始的因为第一个元素是在索引`0`和最后一个元素是在索引`Count-1`。Because the collection indexes are zero-based, the first element is at index `0` and the last element is at index `Count-1`.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用属性和循环构造，如`while`， `for`，或`foreach`语句，用于循环访问对象。Use the property together with a loop construct, such as `while`, `for`, or `foreach` statements, to enumerate through the object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法通过使用来确定相等性方法对象。The method determines equality by using the method on the objects. 方法执行线性搜索; 因此，平均执行时间成比例属性。The method performs a linear search; therefore, the average execution time is proportional to the property. 因为模板区域集合通常很小，所以线性搜索操作的性能并不重要。Because template region collections are typically small, the performance of the linear search operation is not critical.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property IsSynchronized As Boolean
public: property bool IsSynchronized { bool get(); };

summary.span: 获取一个值，该值指示对 对象的访问是否同步（线程安全）。

span.span: Gets a value indicating whether access to the object is synchronized (thread safe).

value.span: 如果对 的访问是同步的，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: , if access to the is synchronized; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 枚举整个集合不是一个线程安全的过程本质上。Enumerating through a collection is not a thread-safe procedure intrinsically. 即使某个集合已同步，其他线程仍可以修改该集合。Even when a collection is synchronized, other threads can still modify the collection. 这会枚举过程中导致异常。This causes exceptions during enumeration. 通过使用锁定集合若要确保线程安全性在整个枚举期间的方法。Lock the collection by using the method during the whole enumeration to guarantee thread safety.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用来检索集合中的指定索引处的区域或区域设置集合中的指定索引处的索引器。Use the indexer to retrieve the region at the specified index within the collection or to set the region at the specified index within the collection. 可以通过使用数组表示法索引集合中的元素。You can index elements in the collection by using array notation. 例如，你可以编制索引处的元素索引`i`使用记数法`DesignerRegions(i)`为 Microsoft visual Basic 或`DesignerRegions[i]`对于 C#。For example, you can index an element at index `i` with the notation `DesignerRegions(i)` for Microsoft VisualBasic or `DesignerRegions[i]` for C#. 当您具有对区域对象的引用，并且需要在集合中对象的索引时，使用方法。When you have a reference to the region object and need the index of the object in the collection, use the method.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性提供一种方便的方式来访问设计器区域集合的控件设计器对象。The property provides a convenient means to access the control designer object for a designer region collection. 例如，你可以使用属性来确定拥有集合的控件设计器的类型并访问的属性和方法的控件设计器。For example, you can use the property to determine the type of control designer that owns the collection and to access the properties and methods of the control designer.

summary.span: 从集合中移除指定的 对象。

span.span: Removes the specified object from the collection.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法从集合中移除指定的区域中的第一个匹配项。The method removes the first occurrence of the specified region from the collection. 如果对象不包含指定`region`，集合保持不变。If the object does not contain the specified `region`, the collection remains unchanged. 不引发异常。No exception is thrown. 方法通过使用来确定相等性方法对象。The method determines equality by using the method on the object. 方法执行线性搜索; 因此，平均执行时间成比例属性。The method performs a linear search; therefore, the average execution time is proportional to the property. 因为模板区域集合通常很小，所以线性搜索操作的性能并不重要。Because template region collections are typically small, the performance of the linear search operation is not critical. 若要从集合中移除特定索引处的区域，使用方法。To remove a region at a particular index from the collection, use the method. 若要从集合中移除所有区域，使用方法。To remove all regions from the collection, use the method. > [!NOTE] > 当从集合中移除项时，集合中的后续项的索引将更改。When you remove an item from the collection, the indexes change for subsequent items in the collection.

span.span: Removes the object at the specified index within the collection.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用方法从集合中移除特定索引处的区域。Use the method to remove a region at a particular index from the collection. 若要从集合中移除指定的区域，使用方法。To remove a specified region from the collection, use the method. 若要从集合中移除所有区域，使用方法。To remove all regions from the collection, use the method. > [!NOTE] > 当从集合中移除项时，集合中的后续项的索引将更改。When you remove an item from the collection, the indexes change for subsequent items in the collection.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 枚举整个集合不是一个线程安全的过程本质上。Enumerating through a collection is not a thread-safe procedure intrinsically. 即使某个集合已同步，其他线程仍可以修改该集合。Even when a collection is synchronized, other threads can still modify the collection. 这会枚举过程中导致异常。This causes exceptions during enumeration. 通过使用锁定集合若要确保线程安全性在整个枚举期间的方法。Lock the collection by using the method during the whole enumeration to guarantee thread safety. 有关线程安全的访问的锁定集合的详细信息，请参阅。For detailed information about locking collections for thread-safe access, see .
